explanation.comment: For those who did not attend Gunn High School

explanation.text:
Explanation [For those who did not attend Gunn High School]:

Gunn High School: The school the creator went to before
Don Austin: The Superintendent of the district
RESPOELESLEF: A reference to SELF, the most useful class... Totally.

Based off of the original Gunn Student Simulator by Sean Yen.

gradegm.text: You return home to find your father standing outside shaking his head.

popularitygm.text: The rumors about you start to boil over and you are being put under investigation.

popularitygm_final.text: Don Austin decides that it is best to put you in a RESPOELESLEF social rehabiliation course.

stressgm.text: The stress starts to become too much.

reputationgm.text: All of your teachers hate you.

reputationgm_final.text: You are expelled after being sent to the office 24 times in a row.

error.comment: Check for when a scene cannot be found

error.text: For some reason we were unable to find that scene! Contact the developer.

start_assembly.comment: Tutorial Assembly to introduce the topics

start_assembly0.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"

start_assembly1.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"
"Here will you need to keep your grades up"

start_assembly2.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"
"Here will you need to keep your grades up"
"Manage your social relationships"

start_assembly3.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"
"Here will you need to keep your grades up"
"Manage your social relationships"
"Try to keep your stress low"

start_assembly4.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"
"Here will you need to keep your grades up"
"Manage your social relationships"
"Try to keep your stress low"
"And keep good relations with your teachers"

start_assembly5.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"
"Here will you need to keep your grades up"
"Manage your social relationships"
"Try to keep your stress low"
"And keep good relations with your teachers"
"These things will slowly fall out of order"

start_assembly_end.text:
Don Austin Gathers all students in the Spangenb*rg Theatre: (Name censored for political reasons)
"Welcome to the illustrious Henry M. Gunn High School"
"Here will you need to keep your grades up"
"Manage your social relationships"
"Try to keep your stress low"
"And keep good relations with your teachers"
"These things will slowly fall out of order"
"Have a good day and don't forget to attend RESPOELESLEF."
[The Assembly comes to a close]

morning_day1.text: Your alarm goes off, it's 6:30 AM.

bike_day1.text: What route should you take going to school?

school_early_day1.text: You arrive really early to school

school_day1.text: There is some extra time before school starts

announcements.comment: Announcements to help the player do what they need to do

announcement_message_day1.text:
"Hello Gunn Students! Today we will be annoucing new changes to the school schedule, to reduce stress we have decided to make RESPOELESLEF mandatory on the weekends"
"Also make sure that you go to RESPOELESLEF not RESLESESELEF, if you do not you will be marked absent"

Here is a helpful tip, when you hover over a choice you are able to see the effects it will have, ( ) is a default or no effect (-) is an effect <= 5. and (=) is an effect that is greater than 5.

per1.text:
[Period 1]:
The teacher continues to drone on and on

discord_check_per1.text: You check to find that you friend needs help but right after you finish helping him the teacher calls on you.

guess_check_per1.text: You somehow get the answer correct!

appeal_check_per1.comment: There is a chance that the effect of appealing is minimized

appeal_check_per1.text: The teacher sighs and calls on someone else, some kids at the back snicker at you.

appeal_check_per1_pass.text: The teacher sighs and calls on someone else, turns out they don't know either and they end up reteaching it.

answer_question_per1.comment: The good student route for per1

answer_question_per1.text: The teacher calls on you and you get the answer correct, but it turns out your friend needed help.

end_per1.text: The bell rings and period 1 comes to a close.

end_per1_question.text: You get some clarification on something that was bothering you, you miss your friends in the hall though.

halls_meet.text: You meet your friends in the halls.

halls_don_austin.text:
You bump into Don Austin in the halls
"I hope you were not saying anything bad about RESPOELESLEF".

halls_don_austingm_final.text: Don Austin himself changes your entire schedule to only RESPOELESLEF.

halls_locker.text:
Your friend asks if you can get something from his locker for him

He says the code is 36, 14, 23

locker1.text: You are at the locker, input the first number.

locker2.text: You are at the locker, input the second number.

locker3.text: You are at the locker, input the third number.

locker_fail.comment: If they fail then these occur

locker2_fail.text: You are at the locker, input the second number.

locker3_fail.text: You are at the locker, input the third number.

locker_input_give_up.text: Turns out your friend really needed that.

per2.text:
[Period 2]
The teacher gives you free work time.

options.text: Work on work for this class

per2_work_normal.text: You're in the middle of your work when your phone buzzes.

per2_work_reprimand.text: The teacher repimands you for doing work that is not relevant to the class

per2_work_ignore.text: You resist the urge to check your phone

per2_work_check_friend.text: Turns out your friend had some important tips for you, the teacher is not amused however.

per2_work_check_spam.text: Turns out it was only spam, and when you go back to your work you realize you lost your train of thought.

per2_work_end.text: Work time comes to a close

assembly.text:
██████████ and ██████ wave to the audience

They start talking and you start zoning out, but you manage to catch some details

assembly_topic0.text:
██████████: "Due to some recent... incidents, all climbing on the Spangenb*rg Theatre will not be tolerated."

██████: "Yes, and if you do so then security find you."

assembly_topic1.text:
██████████: "Remember: cheating will NOT be tolerated."

██████: "Yes, all of our security will be in the classrooms making sure you don't cheat during the SAT."

assembly_topic2.text:
██████████: "Make sure to go to RESPOELESLEF on the weekends!"

██████: "Make sure you don't acciedentially go to RESLESESELEF."

assembly_topic3.text: ██████████: "If you run into Don Austin in the halls make sure you are respectful."

assembly_topic4.text: ██████: "There is NOTHING at the top of the Spangenb*rg theatre."

assembly_end.text:
██████████: "Don't forget, the SAT will be in two days!"

The assembly comes to a close

lunch.comment: 3 lunch actions to help the player

per3.text:
[Period 3]
The teacher stumbles into the room
"Sorry guys I am just really tired today"

per3_line.text:
"Hi just really tired today"
"I am [Name redacted for security reasons]"

What a legend

per3_begin.text: "I don't mind if you do whatever, just try to keep it quiet"

per3_study_alone.text: You study alone and the period passes by quickly

per3_friend_meet.text: You meet with your friends and keep quiet, but you were not that productive

per3_friend_loud.text:
You talk with your friends a bit too loudly and end up angering the teacher, right before you were sent back to your seat your friend says

"If we could somehow sneak out during the tests there would be no one on campus to stop us doing what we want."

per3_friend_study.text: You study with your friends and have a good time, the period passes by quickly

halls2_meet.text: You try to catch up with your friends but lose track of them when class ends.

halls2_bump.text: You bump into someone on the way to your next class, all the papers they were holding fall to the floor

halls2_bump_help.text: You help them pick up their stuff and make a new friend, however you are late to your class

halls2_bump_leave.text: You leave them and go to your next class

halls2_late.text: You relax for a bit but end up late to your next class

halls2_mud_patch.text:
You slip on a patch of mud near the end building


It is claimed another victim.

halls2_class.text: You continue to your class without incident

per4.text:
[Period 4]:
"Today we will be boxing, get into pairs"

boxing_help.text:
In fights you will be given options on what to do, every time you do something the enemy will attack, when the bar lines up in the middle, click block to block the damage. The closer you are to the center, the less damage you take.

Brooding will increase your attack damage by one and defending will decrease the damage you take by 1

boxing_end_win.text: The teacher finishes the matches and you are declared the winner of yours.

boxing_end_lose.text: The teacher finishes the matches and you are declared the loser of yours.

per5.text: You arrive at class and the teacher is not there

per5_leave.comment: Leave cycle, same as after school but go to per6 after

per5_leave.text: Where do you want to go?

per5_leave_library.text: You go to the library and study, nothing eventful happens

per5_leave_caterpillars_win.text: You go to the garden, it is very calming

per5_leave_caterpillars_lose.text: You run away to your next period

per5_leave_theatre.text: You arrive at the Spangenb*rg Theatre

per5_leave_theatre_inside.text:
As you go inside you find a old peice of paper, the text is faded but you are able to read some text

"In the event of a student coming on stage they are allowed to challange the superintendent to a fight, to account for this all superintendents must have rigourous physical training to make sure all students are put in their place"

per5_leave_theatre_climb.text: As you try to climb up security finds you and gets you down, you are escorted to your next class

per6.text:
[Period 6]:
"Today we will be taking an anonymous¹ survey, this is not optional but your results will not¹ be shared with the district"

per6_survey_start.text:
Today you will be taking an anonymous¹ survey

Sponsered by RESPOELESLEF

options.text: I drink alcohol every day, it is my life and my soul
I drink alcohol 3 times a week
I have never drank alcohol in my entire life, I hate the idea of even having a little sip of wine
I am smoking weed right now.
I smoke weed in between classes

per6_survey2.text: On a scale of 1 to 10 how stressful is school?

per6_survey3.text: How do you feel about your school's mental health program?

per6_survey4.text: How many times have you stayed up past midnight to do homework?

per6_survey5.text: How much do you like Don Austin?

per6_survey6.text: How many times have commited crimes in the last 354.432 days?

per6_survey9.text: Have you been honest on this survey?

per6_survey_tos.text: Do you agree to the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy?

per6_survey_tos_read.text: You try to click on the link to read them, but it appears it is just underlined text.

per6_survey_finish.text:
After you submit the survey you see a little text at the bottom:
"¹: If you agreed to the TOS and PP then we will share these with your school district with your name attached"

per7.text:
[Period 7]
You are in the class when all of a sudden the fire alarm goes off

per7_back0.text: You go back when all of a sudden the alarm goes off again

per7_back1.text: By the time you get back to class the school is over

day1_sleep.text: You go to sleep and have a strange dream

store_day1.text: You wander around and find yourself at a store

store_day1_talk0.text: "My name... well don't you know that already, you found this after all"

store_day1_talk1.text: "Spangenb*rg... Ah, its cencored because of me... I'm... Bad at spelling to say the least"

store_day1_talk2.text: "What do I do? Well I sit here at the skyline and watch everything unfold from afar"

store_day1_talk3.text: "Don Austin... I recommend buying up if you want to fight him"

store_day1_talk4.text:
"Sheep... Pool..."
"Huh? I must have zoned out"

store_day1_talk5.text: "I wonder how hard the SAT will be, I wouldn't know"

store_day1_talk6.text: "Have you heard about the 14th letter of the alphabet?"

store_day1_talk7.text: "That knife isn't actually an original design, I'm just really good at stealing other people's ideas"

store_day1_talk8.text: "Watch out for year 666... Oh wait thats a different game"

store_day1_talk9.text: "I'll get it done eventually... No I was not talking to you"

day2_dream_explain.text: You feel as though that dream has some meaning...

morning_day2.text: Your alarm goes off, it's 6:45 AM.

bike_day2.text: What route should you take going to school?

school_early_day2.text: You arrive really early to school

school_day2.text: There is some extra time before school starts

announcement_message_day2.text:
"Hello Gunn Students! Please take note of the people working on the water mains today and try to avoid them."
"We have noticed that some students have been heading to peculiar shops to pick up weapons and padding, this is why we have asked them to change their hours to 2PM to 3PM."

per1_day2.text:
[Period 1]:
You feel your eyes start to close

per1_day2_awake.text: You force yourself to stay awake, and answer the question that you were asked

per1_day2_sleep.text: You go to sleep, and are quickly woken up by the teacher asking you a question

per1_day2_guess_fail.text: You randomly guess and get it wrong, however, no one else knew what it was either

per1_day2_guess_pass.text: You randomly guess and somehow get it right.

per1_day2_appeal.text: The teacher sighs and calls on someone else, turns out no one else knew either.

per1_day2_end.text: The bell rings and the class is dismissed

day2_halls.text: You pass by a strange circle of people

day2_hall_check.text: Turns out that they are fighting, just when you are about to leave, someone pushed you in

day2_hall_fight.text: You are pushed into a fight

per2_day2.text:
[Period 2]
The workers seem to be working above you.
You feel a drip of water on your head

per2_day2_flow.text: That drip starts to turn into a steady stream

per2_day2_burst.text:
The ceiling caves in and you are drenched in water

The teacher sends you to the office and school is called off for the day

per2_day2_check_drip.text: "Oh they must have spilled some water up there it will be fine"

per2_day2_check_flow.text: The teacher finally notices and moves you away, just as you are moved the ceiling caves in and water is dumped where you just were, school is then called off for the day.

afterschool_day2.text:
[Afterschool]
Your friends drag you along to do something.

afterschool_day2_friends_ask.text: They shrug, turns out even they don't know

afterschool_day2_friends_leave.text: Your friends protest but relent once they realize they don't have any ideas on what to do

afterschool_day2_friends_study.text: You go to the library and study with your friends

afterschool_day2_friends_play_games.text: You go to the library and play games... until your times runs out.

afterschool_day2_0.comment: Time events for day2, starts at 12

afterschool_day2_8.text: [Afterschool]: 8pm, you start to feel tired from the days events

store_day2.text: You find yourself at a store, seems like it is closed

store_day2_enter.text: You find a plank on the counter with a note

store_day2_note.text:
Hello,
I hope this finds you well. This should give you some extra defense. I have been asked by the school to close for the day, I will open tomorrow however

store_day2_take.text: You take the plank and leave

day3_dream_explain.text: You wake up in a cold sweat

day3_dream_phone.text: You check your phone and realize that the SAT is today.

morning_day3.text: Your alarm goes off, it's 6:45 AM.

bike_day3.text: What route should you take going to school?

school_early_day3.text: You arrive really early to school

school_day3.text: There is some extra time before school starts

announcement_message_day3.text: "Hello Gunn Students! Please go to your assigned SAT room for testing. Have a good day!"

announcement_ignore_day3.text: You see lots of people going somewhere

announcement_ignore_talk_day3.text: They tell you that the SAT is about to start

outside_school_day3.text: Where do you want to go

outisde_school_found_day3.text: A teacher finds you wandering around

outisde_school_found_run_day3.text: You run away but they see a glimpse of your face

outisde_school_found_fight_day3.text: You start a fight with the teacher

outisde_school_found_fight_win_day3.text: You knock out the teacher and run away quickly

outisde_school_found_fight_lose_day3.text: You get knocked out by the teacher

outisde_school_garden_lose_day3.text: You run away to the garden

outisde_school_garden_visit_day3.text: You go to the garden and find a bag of chips, you feel like you have more endurace after eating them

outisde_school_theatre_day3.comment: this should probably be done last

outisde_school_theatre_day3.text: You arrive at the Spangenb*rg Theatre

outisde_school_theatre_inside_day3.text:
As you go inside you find a old peice of paper, the text is faded but you are able to read some text

"In the event of a student coming on stage they are allowed to challange the superintendent to a fight, to account for this all superintendents must have rigourous physical training to make sure all students are put in their place"

outisde_school_theatre_climb_day3.text: As you try to climb up security finds you and gets you down, you are escorted to your next class

outside_park_day3.comment: Side quest where the player beats up a squirrel

outside_park_day3.text: You are walking in the park when all of a sudden a squirrel steals your phone!

park_quest_fight_day3.text:
Objective: Find and destroy the squirrel [ ]

You encounter the squirrel!

sat_start.text:
As you sit down the proctor begins reading:
"The FitnessGram Pacer test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter Pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal *boop*. A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound *ding*. Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start."

sat_question2.text: Question 2: Which studio made the hit game Among Us?

sat_question3.text: Question 3: What is baking soda's chemical formula?

sat_question4.text: Question 4: What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen sparrow?

options.text: Sparrow, is that like the pokemon?
Wait isn't this test about math and stuff?

sat_question6.text: Question 6: What was Minecraft written in?

sat_question6_end.text: You feel as though this question will cause a useless arguement somehow.

options.text: warping their right arrow key (this has no relation to any events that have occured)

sat_question8.text: Question 8: If a chicken says "all chickens are liars," is this chicken telling the truth?

sat_question9.text: Question 9: What is the name of the country located at 25° 6' N and 121° 35' E?

sat_question9_end.text: For some reason, there is no row to bubble in the answer.

sat_question10.text: Question 10: What is the 4th, 5th, and 6th derivatives of velocity?

options.text: I would never infringe on the trademark of Rice Krispies™

sat_question11.text: Question 11: What goes first when making cereal?

sat_question12.text: Question 12: What does the @ operator do in python?

options.text: Since when could you program a snake?
Ping people to review your spaghetti code
It adds a special attribute to a language element

sat_question12_java.text: Unfortunatly python is not in the curriculum for programming.

options.text: Using contractions in professional and academic writing is bad form and we will grade you lower for using them in your essay.

sat_question15.text: Question 15: What type of nuclear reaction do h-bombs utilize?

options.text: is that the ancestor of the f-bomb?

sat_question16.text: Question 16: Is the place referenced in Question 9 a country?

sat_question16_end.text: You feel as though that question was not supposed to make it onto the test.

sat_question17.text: Question 17: What is the answer to life the universe and everything?

options.text: this is a bit too deep?
Where are the commas in this question?

sat_question18.text: Question 19: What is watermelon in french?

sat_end.text: The time limit is now over, you and your paper in and...

sat_go_home.text: Everything goes well! Everyone is dismissed and heads home.
